suggestions.add:
function: [grey]ADD[grey]
This function is used to add notes of various types, such as alarms, sprints, projects, tasks, and entries.
suggestions.delete:
function: [grey]DELETE[grey]
This function is used to delete notes. It supports deleting a variety of note types.
suggestions.timetable:
function: [grey]TIMETABLE[grey]
This function displays a timetable, organizing tasks by time slots for easy viewing.
suggestions.modify:
function: [grey]MODIFY[grey]
This function is used to modify existing notes, allowing changes to be made to any note type.
suggestions.show:
function: [grey]SHOW[grey]
This function shows all entries. It can be configured to filter by note type, date, or other parameters.
suggestions.config:
function: [grey]CONFIG[grey]
This function is used to configure the task tracker, allowing you to set preferences, adjust settings, and customize the behavior of other functions.
suggestions.task: targets notes or is  related to operations which deal with notes
